name: New Years' Kiss
description:
This is a lovely shimmer/satin pink. With added blue sparkle! 
This will have full coverage in 2-3 coats. Seal with a top coat for a long lasting mani.

This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. 
All bases are 3-free

Photo is 2 coats with top coat. Glitter is Midnight with Mickey

name: Winter Coal (Limited Edition) Mani Bomb
description:
Mani bomb- Let your hands or feet soak with these lovely bomb that will help dry and or sore hands. Great for SWATCHERS!! These add great oils to your hands. You as many times as you wish! 

To use add to a bowl of warm water let hands soak for 10-15 mins. 
Pat dry when done. Do not wash had for up to 30 mins after use. 

The package comes with 4 bombs. Best results when used over and over again!  So stock up!!! 

Please note Mani bombs may break when being shipped! 
This is okay they will still work. They will just have to be sprinkled in to water. (No refunds on broken mani bombs.)

Winter Coal Mani bombs:
No color added.
Scented with 3 wise men,
Vitamin E oil,
Grape seed oil,
Epson Salt,
Black lava Sea Salt,
Baking soda,
& Citric Acid.

name: Mystery Mani bombs
description:
Each month I will have 2 picks for mystery mani bombs. So if you all ready order from 11/25 threw 12/25 They are the same two mani bombs. 

To use:
Add to a bowl of warm water and let hands soak from 10-15 mins. pat hands dry when done. try not to wash hands for up to 30 mins to insure oils don't get washed out. 
Enjoy!

name: Midnight with Mickey
description:
This is a new glitter bomb packed with different sized black & iridescent glitter. Plus Added Mickey glitter in black and sliver holo.

Please shake before use to insure mickeys come out.
Some fishing may be required just because of odd shape of mickey. 

Seal with a top coat to have a long lasting mani. 
This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls.
All bases used are 3-free. 

Photo is New Years Kiss topped with Midnight with Mickey sealed with a top coat

name: Lovely Lavender Mani Bombs
description:
Mani bomb- Let your hands or feet soak with these lovely bomb that will help dry and or sore hands. Great for SWATCHERS!! These add great oils to your hands. You as many times as you wish! 

To use add to a bowl of warm water let hands soak for 10-15 mins. 
Pat dry when done. Do not wash had for up to 30 mins after use. 

The package comes with 4 bombs. Best results when used over and over again!  So stock up!!! 

Please note Mani bombs may break when being shipped! 
This is okay they will still work. They will just have to be sprinkled in to water. (No refunds on broken mani bombs.) 

Lavender bombs made with:
Purple coloring for bath bombs,
Vitamin E oil,
Lavandin (EO),
Lavender (FO),
Citric Acid,
Backing Soda,
Himalayan Pink Salt,
Grape Seed oil, &
chucks of Coco butter.

name: Winter Party
description:
What bases polish with diamond shimmer and blue and pink hex glitter.
This goes on sheer and will need 3-4 coats for coverage. 
Seal with a top coat for long lasting mani. 

Please shake before use.
This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls.
All bases are 3-free.

name: Peppermint Mani Bombs!
description:
So late one night I couldn't stop thinking about putting my dry hands in with a Bath bomb. lol I knew it would be a waste of a bath bomb. So I thought about a Little tiny Bath bomb! 

So meet my Mani Bombs! 
They are tiny bath bomb just for your hands. 

Packed with the best!
Baking soda, Citric acid, Dead sea salt, Himalayan pink salt, Shea butter, Cocoa butter, Vitamin E oil, Jojoba oil, Apricot oil, Argon oil, Grape seed oil, Peppermint so and Eucalyptus eo

They are packed with oils and things that are GREAT for your skin. 

HOW TO USE: Get a bowl that will fit your hands. Run warm water in to it. Place hand in water and drop in bomb. Best to do both hand together but won't hurt to do one at a time. Let sit for 15 mins. for best results. Pat your skin dry when done. 

Your hand should feel very smooth and refreshed after use.

Great to pair up with the peppermint cuticle butter.  

This comes in a pack of 4. 

First photo credit to @Mrslochness on IG

name: Winter Mint
description:
This is a glitter bomb and is packed with white hearts mint hex, dots, turquoise holo hex large & small and blue dots. 

Please shake before use. Hearts may sink. 

This comes in a 15mL bottle with a mixing ball. 
all bases are 3-free. 

Swatch photo Credit @mrslochness on Instagram

name: Eat Me!! (Thermal)
description:
A beautiful red with cold and clear/nude when warm. Added red flakies, red/gold marco flakies, sliver holo glitter & fine red hex.

Can be layered over colors or worn alone. 

This comes in a 15mL bottle with a mixing ball. 
Do not let thermal polish sit in sun may ruin the pigment. 

All base are 3-free. 

Please shake before use. 

Swatch photo Credit @mrslochness on Instagram

name: Crush the Candy Cane!
description:
This is a glitter bomb backed with red and white shreds and red flakies. with added holo dust. 


This should go on smooth with one coat. 

Shake before use. Added a top coat for a good seal and a long lasting mani. 

This comes in a 15mL with a mixing ball. 

All bases are 3-free! 


Swatch photo Credit @mrslochness on Instagram

name: Death By Candy Cane
description:
Glitter bomb packed with red and white short slices, White squares, fine red hex, & White skulls and crossbones. 

This comes in a 15mL with a large mixing ball. All bases are 3 free.

This polish need to be shaken or flipped over for a few before use. Glitter may sink after sitting for a while. 

Fishing may be required for the skull and cross bone glitter. 
They are heavy. 


Swatch photo Credit @mrslochness on Instagram

name: Don't Eat the Snow! Limitied Edition
description:
Sinks a lot! That's why it is on sale! 
Please Note I have ordered a NEW BASE that works amazing! I should not be having this problem anymore! Thanks. 

This is a new glitter bomb!

It is packed with white short slices, rectangles, hex and squares. With Yellow Stars, Dots and Skull & Crossbones. 

This need to be added over a color! 
Please Shake the bottle well or flip it over before use. 
The heavy glitter may sink after sitting for a while. 
Fishing may be required for the bigger glitter like the Skulls. 


Swatch photo Credit @mrslochness on Instagram

name: Rain Clouds
description: This is a thermal polish Blue when warm/hot and purple when cold. There is added blue holo glitter to it for and extra shine. This can be worn with an undie or not. Maybe shear with no undie but still looks great. This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. 3-free bases All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Blog Review By DullLikeGlitter

name: Sea Monster
description: Sea Monster is a 3-Free polish packed with Sliver Holo hexes (.040) , Blue hex glitter (.008), Lime green square Glitter (.008) & Blue holo hex glitter (.008) This can be used by its self or as a glitter top coat over any color of your liking. The glitter mix goes on supper smooth. Add a top coat for a shiny finish. The shine is amazing! Comes with 1-2 mixing balls. All bottles are glass and only come in a large 15 ML bottle. Unless stated other wise. 3-free All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Enjoy. Photos: First 2 photos are from TwoLacquredGirls Blog Layered over Pure Ice in Twisted. Read the Blog on it here: Blog Review By TLG 3 and 4 are from: Blog Review By LoveLifeLacquer Layered over a white polish! She also wrote a blog on it. Go check them out. last photo credit to @Bluevelvetlacquer on Instagram Read the blog: Review From Blue Velvet Lacquer Other blogs on Sea Monster: Blog Review By The3GlamourGirls

name: Skull & CrossBone (Sugar Skulls & Toxic Babe) LAST CALL
description: Sugar Skulls- This is in a shear off what base with added holo dust & fine blue holo glitter. Added Skull & Cross Bone glitter ( Please note these may sink! Dabbing method will help to place these large glitters. Also just mixing you polish with a toothpick will help a lot. I made to sure to add a lot of them to the base to make sure you will be able to get them out. Any problems with this please contact me!) Bubble gum pink shreds, baby blue diamonds, Matte gray hex, and iridescent bar glitter (Short slice). **PLEASE NOT THERE ARE PURPLE HEARTS IN THE PHOTO! THEY ARE NOT IN THE POLISH! I THOUGHT IT LOOKED BETTER WITH OUT THEM. This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls in a 3-Free base. All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free It can be worn alone with full coverage in 3 coats or as a glitter topper. Add a top coat to make sure you mani last. Also to help the Skulls and hearts stay down on to the nail. Toxic Babe This is a glitter bomb in a clear base. This is packed with white skull and cross bone glitter, white diamonds, white squares, Black squares, black stars, black hex, large black circles, neon green squares, neon green stars, neon green hex, & hot pink squares. This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls in a 3-Free base. Photos: Sugar Skulls over one coat of Sally Hansen "Wet Cement" Toxic Babe two coats over Sally Hansen "Wet Cement" Remember LARGE glitter may Sink! There are a few things you can do for this. Shaking the bottle between paint nails, flipping the bottle upside down before doing your mani or taking a tooth pink and mixing. I try my best to pack all the bottle to insure that you can get the glitter out. **Fishing may be needed. Last 2 photos Credit to @Bluevelvetlacquer on Instagram Blog Review From Blue Velvet Lacquer

name: CoCo
description: CoCo is a pigmented brown shimmer polish with added holographic dust. Goes on smooth and you only need 2 coats for full coverage. This comes in a 15 ML bottle and has 2 mixing balls. All bases are 3-Free 2nd photo done in sunlight. 1st & 3rd Photo credit to: VanCityPolishnv Blog Read the Blog: Blog Review By VanCityPolishnv

name: Fall For Me.
description:
This is a creaming nude color with some shifting pink action to it. It also has added SF-14. Not to much just a light shimmer. 

Goes on Smooth and will have full coverage in 2-3 coats. 

This comes in a 15mL with 2 mixing balls. 
Made with all 3-free bases. 

Photo Credit to : @ Shadesofglitter on Instagram.

name: Pumpkin Spice  (Thermal)
description: Please note due to supplier changer there pigment this patch of PUMPKIN SPICE has a more pumpkin orange look to it. Should stay like this for all future batches. This is a pumpkin Orange to Yellow thermal with added burnt orange holo glitter. This should go on super smooth and have full coverage in 2 coats. This comes in a 15mL bottle and has 2 mixing balls with a 3-free base. All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Every polish is hand mixed and may vary in color with each batch. Please give a good shake before use. First photo Credit to @Shadesofglitter on Instagram Photos are taken in natural lighting. 3 coats with a top coat. Blogs: Review By Souly Stones

name: Spiced Cake
description: This is a white crelly polish with Fine burgundy glitter, medium matte burgundy hex, burgundy hex and Orange Hex Should get full coverage in 2-3 coats. this comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. Made with 3-free bases. 1st swatch credit to @BlueVelvetlacquer on Instagram Blog Review From Blue Velvet Lacquer 2nd Swatch photo done by Shades of glitter on Instagram

name: Gray Glitter Guns & Money
description:
Listing for gray glitter guns & green money scented with Jean Paul Gaultier (Type)

This is a men's type but I have to say that this smells amazing! 
I think it can be used for anyone. 

This will also come with a Money shaped soap. Same scent. 

comes with 2 gun shapes and 2 money shapes. 


All soap is hand made and hand poured. Great for Sensitive Skin. It is 3% Concentrated with the fragrance oils in each bar. Smells wonderful. Use as soap as needed or for a great Smelling bathroom decoration. Will work as a air freshener as well in and around the house! 
All soap very's unique and colors may very. All soap is hand poured individual.

**Crystal wst White (White Glycerin) & Crystal St Clear (Clear Glycerin)
All Vegetable base. 
Good foaming 
Excellent Moisturizer. 
PH 7.5 to 8.5 
With added Titanium Dioxide as a opacifier

5-Free** 
Winner of the Queens Award. 
NO Sulfates 
No MPG 
NO Pegs. 
NO Parabens 
NO Animal Testing***


Please READ Policies on Soaps. Heat NOTICE in there.

name: Peppermint Cuticle Oil
description:
So I really needed to make a cuticle oil that would help heal cracks on my cuticles. I have used so many and they have only worked for a few weeks. I have now been testing these for weeks and I LOVE them. It is not over whelming. They make your cuticles soft and smooth for hours. I recommend for people who SWATCH a lot. 

I will have more scents in the future just sticking with Peppermint for the holidays. :) 

Best Paired with Mani BOMBS coming soon :)  


Avocado oil, Sweet Almond oil, Apricot oil, Jojoba oil, Argan oil, Essential oils

name: Blueberry Cheesecake WAX MELTS
description:
New wax melts scented with Blueberry Cheesecake! These small AMAZING! You may want to eat them but PLEASE don't. 

This listing is ONLY for the Melts. 
The Oil burners can be found in many store. Also online. 
Search for WAX MELTS OIL BURNER. 

I may get more in stock soon. 


2 Shapes:
Berries will come in set of 5 for 3.00$
Mustaches will come in a set of 2 for 2.50$



I may or may not be adding other shapes. 



HOW TO USE:

Place in oil burner 
Light tea light and let melt. 
Blow out tea light or add more. UP TO YOU! :) 

ENJOY!

name: Hello Kitty Hand Soap
description:
This is a listing for a mini hand soap in the shape of Hello Kitty & Her Bow. They are bright pink. (Color may vary from each batch) This has added Lavender Flowers in it & Lavender EO + Sandal Wood EO for a new and different smell. 

Listing is for a Mini Hello Kitty & Bow = 2 mini soaps. 

All soap is hand poured, one bar at a time. 
Any designs are hand poured and added all by hand.
We do not make these soaps in big slaps.
Each is one of a kind. 
Colors and size may very only because not one soap is alike.

**Crystal St Clear (Clear Glycerin) 
All Vegetable base. 
Good foaming
Excellent Moisturizer.
PH 7.5 to 8.5
With added Titanium Dioxide as a opacifier  

5-Free**
Winner of the Queens Award. 
NO Sulfates
No MPG
NO Pegs. 
NO Parabens
NO Animal Testing***

Please READ Policies on Soaps. Heat NOTICE in there.

name: Peanut Butter & Apricot wax melt
description:
This is a unique smell. Almost like PB&J sandwiches :)

This comes in a set of 3.

This is a listing for the wax Melts only.


How to use:

Place on a oil burner/warmer that you can get online or other stores. 

Light the tea light and place wax melt in place. 

Blow out when melted or add another one. Up to you :) 

ENJOY!

name: Razz Berry
description:
This is a listing for a pink/red polish with added Diamond Dust for some extra shine. 

This goes on Smooth and has a nice shine. Add top coat for a long lasting Manicure. Full Coverage in 2-3 coats. 

This comes in a 15mL bottle with 1-2 mixing balls. 

All bases are 3-Free and 100% hand mixed.

name: Glam Galaxy
description:
This is a Blue/Green polish with added blue holo glitter and dark blue hex. This dry's matte. Add a top coat for a great shine. 

Because of the Darkness of this polish Use a base coat and when removing pull cotton ball down in one direction to avoid staining.

All bases used are 3-Free.
Come in a 15mL bottle and with 1-2 mixing balls.

name: Purple Glow
description:
Purple Glow is a pigmented Purple with green shimmer in it. 

THIS DOES NOT GLOW IN THE DARK! 

Full Coverage in 2-3 coats. 

All bases Used are 3-Free.
Comes in a 15mL bottle and with 1-2 mixing balls.

name: Cuticle Butter  + added bees wax NEW
description: Our New Cuticle Butter Melt on contact! It is great for dry damaged cuticles. It gives off a oil feel so best used after washing hand or before bed. This come is a 1 oz. jar with easy cap removal. Our cuticle Butter is made with; Bees Wax, ***NEW Coco Butter, Shea Butter, Vitamin E Oil, & Glycerin. Scented with Lavender for a great smell. Please READ Policies on Soaps. Heat NOTICE in there. Review By BeautyLitFromnWithIn

name: Large Mystery Box
description:
This will include 2-3 soap products and 2-3 polishes. 
Picked at random. 

Valued at 24-36$

Order 2 and get free shipping with code : MysteryShip

name: Mystery Box!
description:
This will come with a Mystery Mini Nail Polish and a cuticle butter. 

Polish picked at random. I will look over past orders.

name: Sticks & Stones Last Call
description:
This is a glitter topper with matte white Skull & Cross bone glitter, white stars, matte grey hex, fine matte hex glitter, white bar glitter white rectangle glitter, Iridescent bar glitter, holo diamonds, and super fine holo dust. 

This is a glitter packed polish and will need a top coat for a good seal.

All polish is 3-free and come is a 15mL bottle unless other wise stated. will include 2 mixing balls or one large one.

name: DUO! Fallin' for Him & Fallin' for Her Glitter BOMBS
description:
This is sold as a set. I will have an option to buy it alone also.
SET SOLD OUT! (Lasted 4 Mins SORRY) 

Fallin' for Him
This is packed with different sized gold glitter
-Stars -Circles -Hex -Squares & -Fine glitter

also packed with blue glitter & green glitter. 

Fallin' for Her
This is packed with different sized gold glitter
-Stars -Circles -Hex -Squares -Fine glitter -Dust & -Diamonds 

With added pink glitter

There should be no problem getting all the glitter out of the bottle but you should give the bottle a good shake before use. 
This comes in a 15 mL bottle with 2 mixing balls in a 3-free base. 
 All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free

Please not that heavy glitter may sink. 
Each batch is hand made and may vary.

Glitter bomb may have a thicker base and a dabbing method will be useful when apply this polish.
Add a good top coat for a nice smooth finish. 

Photos are taking in natural light for best results to show true color of polish. The polish can look different in other lighting.

Photo Credit to @Shadesofglitter on Instagram

name: Em-Roll Fall  LAST CALL
description:
This is a deep Emerald green with added holo (Non-liner) 
This drys to a matte finish. 
This should dry very quick and will have a full coverage in 2 coats. 
For a nice shine please add a top coat. 

This comes in a 15mL bottle and will have to mixing balls in a 3-free base.  All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free

Swatch photo Credit to @Shadesofglitter on Instagram

name: Wax Burner/Oil burner
description:
This comes with an Oil Burner & 4 tea lights. 
 
If you do not need the Oil Burner you can just buy they wax melts!! 


Pic show is of the blue one. 
Glass.

Other in an iron one not shown. If you want photos please e-mail me and I will try my best.

name: You Talking to Me!!
description:
*** Please note this color may very due to the fact that the purple color is hand made by me using colors to make purple. 
-Thank you 
*Ashley. 



This is a purple holographic jelly based polish! 
It goes on super smooth and needs about 3 coats for full coverage. 

This is a 3-free polish!! 
all bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free.

Comes in a 15 ML with 2 mixing balls. 

1st photo Credit to @Lacquerloon On Instagram

2nd Photo Credit to @shadesofglitter on Instagram 
Taken In the Sun.

name: Blue Smoke
description: Limited amount. PLEASE NOTE! I have found the closest pigment to the last one that I could May seam a little lighter but not much! Look at first photo for the latest swatch of blue smoke. Also due to lighting color may vary from photo to photo. -Ashley Blue Smoke is From the Forever Magic Collection It is a dark blue with holographic dust added!!! This in nonliner. The formula is super smooth and will have full coverage in 2 coats. 3-Free formula. All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Comes in a 15 ML with 2 mixing balls. 1st Photo Done by @Bluevelvetlacquer on instagream Read the Blog:Blog Review From Blue Velvet Lacquer 2nd Photo done by TwoLacquredGirls Blog Read the blog: Blog Review By TLG 3rd Photo done By @lacquerloon On Instagram 4th Photo done By @PackAPunchNails On Instagram 5th Photo done by @Dulllikeglitter on Instagram Blog Review By DullLikeGlitter Other Blogs on BLUE SMOKE: Nails By Natasha Blog Review Blog Review By The3GlamourGirls NailArtAficionado Blog Review

name: A-Maze-Me (Limited Edition)
description: This is a neon purple holo (non liner) with added fine hot pink hex. This goes on smooth and should have full coverage in 2 coats. This comes in a 15mL bottle and is a 3-FREE formula All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Photo credit to @mrslochness on Instagram Photo Credit to 2,3 & 4: Lace and Lacquers Read the BLOG: Review by Lace & Lacquers

name: Bite Me, Pacman  (Limitied Edition)
description: This is a glitter bomb super fun polish! Packed with yellow dots, blue neon hex and fine neon small hex. Comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. 3-free All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Yellow dots may sink please give a good shake! First photo credit to @Mrslochness 2nd photos credit to Read the Blog: Review by Lace & Lacquers

name: Infinity Wishes (Limited Edition)
description: This is a glitter bomb packed with iridescents, green, mint, white, white stars & shreds. Comes in a 15mL bottle and is 3-free All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Swatch photos is done by @mrslochness on Instagram over Milani Dressmaker. This should go on smooth and shouldn't sink to the bottom. Please give a good shake. 2nd swatch is also by @mrslochness on Instagram 3rd & 4th photo Credit to: Lace and Lacquers Read the Blog: Review by Lace & Lacquers 5th Photo Credit to @Bluevelvetlacquer on Instagram Blog Review From Blue Velvet Lacquer

name: Royal Bash (Limited Edition)
description: This is Thermal polish Pink when Warm. Purple when Cold. With added Gold Holo Glitter. The formula is jellie like. This comes in a 15ml Bottle and is a 3-FREE formula All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Photo Credit to: Lace and Laquers Read the blog: Review by Lace & Lacquers

name: I caught the Glitter Bug! LIMITED EDITION
description: This is a limited edition polish for Forever Polished Birthday Bash. This is a Black Jellie polish with added holo dust, fine pink glitter, fine blue glitter. Blue dot and pink dots. This is a super fun polish and is PACKED with glitter. First Photos Credit to Lace and Lacquers Read the BLOG: Review by Lace & Lacquers Last photo Credit to @mrslochness on Instagram This comes in a 15mL bottle and 2 mixing balls. 3-free All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free

name: Glitter Storm
description:
This is a SUPER GLITTER POLISH! 
There are 15 different kinds of glitter in here! 

The polish maybe a little on the thick side just because it is so packed. You can get full coverage with just two coats. It will try with an almost texture look to it. To get a great shine add a good top coat for long lasting.

For removing all this glitter you may want to try the glue base coat trick or soaking your nails in remover with a cotton ball wrapped in foil. Let sit for 10 MINS. 

This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. 
This is made with all 3-free bases.
 All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free

name: Neon Babe
description: NEW BATCHES- HAS MORE OF A GRAY TONE TO IT :) This is a white bases polished with added holo dust so it gives it a off-grey look to it. It has Neon Green squares, Neon Green Stars & Purple Stars. Please note that the Stars are a bigger glitter and may sink. PLEASE give a good shake before use. First Photo done by TwoLacquredGirls Blog TwoLacqueredGirls Blog Review The photos are 3 coats with a top coat. No undies. 4th & 5th photo Credit to @Shadesofglitter on INSTAGRAM This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. All bases are 3-free. All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free

name: Cherry
description: Cherry is a Cherry red jelly polish!! With Holographic dust added!! Goes on smooth and has even been explained as "Squishy" This is a shear polish and needs about 3 coats. Cones in a 15 ML bottle with 2 mixing balls All bases are 3-Free. All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free Photo credit to VanCityPolishnv Blog Read the Blog: http://vancitypolishnv.blogspot.ca/2013/02/forever-polished-coco-and-cherry.html 3rd credit to @Shadesofglitter on Instagram 4th photo done by @Dulllikeglitter on Instagram Blog Review By DullLikeGlitter

name: Moon Shine  (1st Birthday)
description: Hello, Holographic!!!! This is Packed with Holo goodnees!!!! This has a bunch of holo glitter (.008) Sliver holo Hex (.040) Sliver Holo Moons & Holo dust. Their is so much shine you will have to try it for your self!! This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. 3-free bases All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free 1st photo credit to @PackAPunchNails On Instagram 2nd, 3rd & 4th Photo Credit to: Love Life Lacquer Blog Review Go Read the blog she had on moon shine. :)

name: Something Blue
description: * DARK BATCH * Something Blue is a light blue jelly based polish! With Holographic dust added!!! It has a great shine and goes on smooth. You will have full coverage in two coats. All bases used are 3-Free!! All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free 1st photo done with flash in light box 2nd and 3rd Photos Done by: TwoLacquredGirls Blog Check out her blog review!! Blog Review By TLG Read the blog on the last 2 photos here Blog By Charismaticlly Polished

name: Bubble Trouble
description: Is a glitter bomb packed with blue fine glitter, matte neon green stars, matte plum hex, matte hot pink squares, matte grey hex & black rectangles. Please note that stars and rectangles are bigger glitter and may sink to the bottom. Please give a good shake before use. This comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls. All base are 3 free. All bases are also free of Camphor and are cruelty-free First two photos credit to TwoLacquredGirls Blog TwoLacqueredGirls Blog Review photos is shown with one coat and top coat.

name: Watermelon Punch
description: This is a white bases polish with added water melon hex, large purple dots, turquoise squares & fine watermelon glitter. Please not that the purple dots are bigger glitter and may sink. Please give a good shake before use. Goes on smooth 1st & 2nd photo Credit to @Shadesofglitter on INSTAGRAM 3rd photo Credit to TwoLacquredGirls Blog TwoLacqueredGirls Blog Review Photos are 3 coats with a top coat. Will have full coverage in 2 coats, just wanted to show more of the glitter. Comes in a 15mL bottle with 2 mixing balls All base are 3-free

name: Rocker Girl
description: Rocker girl is a clear polish packed with glitter Matte gray hexes of many sizes and neon hot pink hexes. Added neon matter glitter to it also. In the photos Rocker Girl is shown over a light purple. Then shown on swatch sticks. Alone - 3 coats over white - 3 coats & over black - 3 coats This come in a 15 ML bottle with 2 mixing balls All bases are 3-free and First Photo Credit to @Dulllikeglitter on Instagram Blog Review By DullLikeGlitter Second photo Credit & Blog Review < a href=http://www.raineydaynails.com/2013/06/forever-polished-and-forever-bubbles.html> Blog Review By RaineyDayNails

name: Galaxy Crusier REMIXED!
description: Yup I said, Remixed!! This is the new and improved Galaxy Cruiser! I need to make it so the glitter didn't sink as much! So I took out some of the larger Hexes from the last mix and added purple stars!! So this is what I came up with still very similar! This base is with a blue shimmer that slightly shifts. Added with pink dots, Sliver holo hex (.040), Large sliver holo hexes (.062), Blue and purple stars. This polish is packed!!! Should have no problem getting all the glitter out and on to the nail! All bases are 3-Free First photo credit to @_lovely_nails_ on INSTAGRAM 5th photo credit to @Dirtyrichhh on Instagram Blog Review By The3GlamourGirls
